entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ivujivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:19 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -32.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ivujivik Airport 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -32.9°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -49
Dewpoint: -37.6°C
Wind: SE 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 32. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 32. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
